text: Tusim jadom' unham vala palatonge tam uha tuhade sahamane bahane bana'unage. (Unham nu? Akha devo ki bahane na bana'u asim kade vi tuhadi gala nahim manani. Besaka alaha ne sanu tuhadi'am prasathiti'am di janakari de diti hai. Huna alaha ate rasula tuhade karamam nu dekhanage. Phira tusim usa vala more ja'uge jihara pragata ate gupata nu janana vala hai jo kujha tusim kara rahe ho usa bare uha tuhanu dasa devega)
